allentown.neighborhoods: Center City, West End, South Allentown, Old Allentown
allentown.meetingHighlights: Active downtown meetings and several groups across the Lehigh Valley, including Spanish-language and LGBTQ-friendly meetings.
allentown.transitInfo: LANta buses serve Allentown and nearby towns; Lehigh Valley International Airport (ABE) for regional travel.

pittsburgh.neighborhoods: Downtown, South Side, Shadyside, Lawrenceville, Oakland, Strip District, Squirrel Hill
pittsburgh.meetingHighlights: Large, active fellowship with many campus and neighborhood meetings, notable speaker meetings in Squirrel Hill and downtown.
pittsburgh.transitInfo: Port Authority of Allegheny County buses and light rail connect neighborhoods; Pittsburgh International Airport (PIT) serves the region.

philadelphia.neighborhoods: Center City, Old City, South Philly, Fishtown, University City, Kensington, Manayunk
philadelphia.meetingHighlights: Major recovery hub with meetings throughout five boroughs; birthplace of AA traditions; diverse Center City and neighborhood presence.
philadelphia.transitInfo: SEPTA subway, bus, and regional rail; Philadelphia International Airport (PHL); Amtrak hub.

harrisburg.neighborhoods: Downtown Harrisburg, Midtown, Uptown, Allison Hill, Susquehanna Township
harrisburg.meetingHighlights: State capital recovery with government worker meetings; diverse schedule throughout metro area; Susquehanna River location.
harrisburg.transitInfo: CAT bus service; Harrisburg International Airport (MDT); Amtrak service.

scranton.neighborhoods: Downtown Scranton, Green Ridge, Hill Section, Dunmore, South Side
scranton.meetingHighlights: Historic coal mining city recovery; strong working-class traditions; Electric City meetings throughout NEPA.
scranton.transitInfo: COLTS bus service; Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport (AVP); I-81 corridor.
